Package demo.Zhihao.Client

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatClient
    The model of the client.
    The design pattern of the client is MVC
    ImageOutput
    Output jtextpane to jpeg.
    PrivateConv
    This is the main class for direct connection(using UDP) between 2 clients.
    Receiver
    This class is used to retrieve the data sent by the server using TCP protocol.
    Sender
    This class is used to send messages using TCP protocol.
    This class should never be instantiated.
    Test  
    UDPReceiver
    This class is transplanted from the IMServer project.
    This is used to retrieve the messages sent using UDP.
    UDPSender
    Used to send datagrams via a specified UDP protocol.
    UIChatRoom
    The GUI of the chatroom.
    UIEmotionButton
    A label to display the emotion icon.
    This class should NOT be instantiated elsewhere other than UIEmotionPane.
    UIEmotionPane
    A pane showing all the emotion icons and used to insert emotion icons into the document.
    UIPrivateConversation
    This is the view part of the Private Conversation Module.
    UIRoomContent
    This is the content part of the client GUI
    including display box, bulletin, message box, send button, member list.
    UIRoomTitle
    The title part of the chat room,
    including the chat room name, description and the user logged in information.
